summary: We bought this radio for use in a remote location where radio stations are very difficult to pick up, but we do have internet and WIFI via DSL.

I configure the second ASUS (repeater) to connect to a Linksys AP I have elsewhere in the house.
Our current wireless router gave us a very weak signal in the upstairs bedroom which is a bit far away from the router (through a couple of walls, up the stairs, and towards the front of the house).

Once I logged in, I was able to put in the required information for my network, rebooted the repeater and it was up and running.It should be noted that once the repeater has gained access to your network via SSID and password, you will not be able to access the ASUS repeater directly since any access will take you to the primarily router on your system (if your primary router's address is 192.168.1.1).Overall, I give the product 4 out of 5 stars.
